bio: I'm the terror that flaps in the night! I'm the batteries that are not included, I'm the wrong # that wakes you at 3am, I'm the hairball that clogs your drains, I'm a special news bulletin that interupts your favorite show, Oh! You can call me Jepoy University of Santo Tomas Electrical Engineering AMA Computer University Computer Engineering Saint Claire School igad Interactive Solutions Inc. ZPT Publications myGlobe Destiny Cable Inc.
